scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:index && npm run purge && npm run minify:js && npm run sw
scripts.build:index: npx parcel build src/index.html src/examples.html --log-level verbose --no-source-maps --public-url ./
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist && npx parcel serve src/*.html --no-cache --no-source-maps --open --port 4321
scripts.minify:js: find dist -name "index*.js" -print0 | xargs -0 -P 4 -I {} sh -c 'before=$(wc -c < {}); minify {} > {}.min && after=$(wc -c < {}.min); if [ ${after} -lt ${before} ]; then mv {}.min {}; reduction=$((${before}-${after})); percent=$(awk "BEGIN {printf \"%.2f\", ${reduction}/${before}*100}"); echo "{} reduced from ${before} to ${after} bytes (${percent}% reduction)"; else rm {}.min; echo "{} no reduction achieved, file size unchanged"; fi'
scripts.purge: cd dist && rm a* bat* bicep* c*.js d* ecl* elixir* f* g* h* ini* j* k* less* liquid* lua* lexon* m3* mips* msdax* mysql* obj* p* q* r* s*.*.js t* v* w* x* y*
scripts.analyze: rm -rf dist && npx parcel build --no-source-maps --reporter @parcel/reporter-bundle-analyzer src/index.html
